input_text:
Job Title: Bookkeeper

Location: Westbury, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Join Our Team as a Skilled Bookkeeper!

Are you ready to elevate your career in finance?

Salary: Up to $70,000 per year

Job Type: Full-time

If you're passionate about numbers, thrive in a dynamic work environment, and seek growth opportunities, then we want you on our team.

Why You'll Love Working With Us

Competitive Salary: Earn up to $70,000 per year as a valued member of our finance team. Comprehensive Benefits: Enjoy a full range of benefits including health insurance, retirement plans, and generous paid time off. Professional Development: Take advantage of opportunities for advancement and continuous learning within our company. Positive Work Environment: Join a supportive team where your contributions are recognized and appreciated. 

What You'll Do

As a Bookkeeper, you'll play a pivotal role in maintaining our financial integrity and supporting our company's success. Your responsibilities will include:

Accurate Financial Management: Prepare deposits, reconcile accounts, and ensure precise recording of financial transactions. Customer Account Management: Enter and apply approved credits for customer accounts, fostering positive relationships with our clients. Streamlined Processes: Utilize your strong computer skills, including proficiency in Microsoft Office and Excel, to streamline financial processes and maximize efficiency. Continuous Improvement: Collaborate with our team to identify opportunities for process improvement and contribute to our ongoing success. 

What We're Looking For

Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in bookkeeping or a related field. Skills: Strong computer skills with proficiency in Microsoft Office and Excel. Education: An associate's degree in Accounting or a related field is preferred. Bonus: Experience with Netsuite software is a plus, but not required. 

Ready to take the next step in your career? Join us and make a meaningful impact in a dynamic and rewarding work environment.

How To Apply

 Nesco Resource provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

preferred_degrees: Associate's degree in Accounting or a related field
